# Upsense API
The API v1 server is created is an Express.js application

# Setup Guide

- Install dependencies using [npm](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/init) `npm install`
- Configure `./ormconfig.yml` with the postgre credential in your machine
- Run `npm start dev`


# API Usage
The first step to be able to use the api is to request a [JWT](https://jwt.io/) token. This requires you to provide a valid `username` and `password`
the reason for this is that the route uses [HTTP Basic authentication](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_access_authentication).

> URL: api/v1/auth/login `Method: POST `

Sample response:
```
{
    "token": "Token_eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..yQ5C3wkkca2eEYTqNAhMrN2UhpcgE3vQIJNYmDBaNlA"
}
```

You can now use this token in the `Authorization` header in a `Bearer Token` format on each of your api requests
